item.title: #vROps Webinar 2016 : Part 4 â€“ Contention Based Performance & Capacity Management
item.description:
As promised, I am posting the recording for the 4th Session of vROps Webinar Series 2016. We successfully delivered the session on Contention Based Performance & Capacity Management using vRealize Operations Manager!

 <p>
 <b><i>Session Details:- </i></b>With this instalment of the series, we have a new speaker <a href="https://twitter.com/e1_ang">Iwan Rahabok</a>, who will entertain and educateÂ us ðŸ™‚ He is no stranger to the world of vRealize Operations Manager and has written a couple of books on vROps as well.
 </p>
 
 <p>
 During this session we will help you understand a few basic concepts of using the right counters to monitor performance and capacity in your infrastructure. We will deep dive into the concept of the consumer and the provider layer and help you with solving issues which you might face as a provider of infrastructure to your business.
 </p>
 
 <p>
 <b>I also want to personally thankÂ <a href="https://twitter.com/Sunny_Dua" target="_blank">Sunny</a> & <a href="https://twitter.com/e1_ang">Iwan</a><a href="https://twitter.com/simoneady">Â </a>for their continued support to this series.</b>
 </p>
 
 <p>
 <b>Here is the recording for this session:::</b>
 </p>
 
 <p>
 Note : It is recommended that you watch the video in HD quality for a great experience.
 </p>
 
 <p>
 <iframe width="500" height="281" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mhXkiRWXEBg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 </p>
